4.7 Grouping parentheses: recommended:
{
    "Answer": "Yes",
    "Configuration": "<module name='WhitespaceAround'>
        <property name='allowEmptyMethods' value='true'/>
        <property name='allowEmptyTypes' value='true'/>
        <property name='allowEmptyCatch' value='true'/>
        <property name='allowEmptyIf' value='true'/>
        <property name='allowEmptyDoWhile' value='true'/>
        <property name='allowEmptyFor' value='true'/>
        <property name='allowEmptyWhile' value='true'/>
        <property name='allowEmptySwitch' value='true'/>
        <property name='allowEmptySynchronized' value='true'/>
        <property name='allowEmptyTry' value='true'/>
        <property name='tokens' value='ASSIGN, BAND, BAND_ASSIGN, BOR, BOR_ASSIGN, BSR, BSR_ASSIGN, BXOR, BXOR_ASSIGN, COLON, DIV, DIV_ASSIGN, EQUAL, GE, GT, LAND, LCURLY, LE, LITERAL_ASSERT, LITERAL_CATCH, LITERAL_DO, LITERAL_ELSE, LITERAL_FINALLY, LITERAL_FOR, LITERAL_IF, LITERAL_RETURN, LITERAL_SYNCHRONIZED, LITERAL_TRY, LITERAL_WHILE, LOR, LT, MINUS, MINUS_ASSIGN, MOD, MOD_ASSIGN, NOT_EQUAL, PLUS, PLUS_ASSIGN, QUESTION, RCURLY, SL, SLIST, SL_ASSIGN, SR, SR_ASSIGN, STAR, STAR_ASSIGN, TYPE_EXTENSION_AND, TYPE_EXTENSION_OR, UNARY_MINUS, UNARY_PLUS'/>
    </module>"
}
